message.content:
1. All groups showed significant antihypertensive effects at Week 4.
2. CKD-828 combinations exhibited superior BP-lowering effects than S-amlodipine 2.5 mg at Week 4.
3. The two CKD-828 combinations tested were CKD-828 2.5/40 mg and CKD-828 2.5/80 mg.
4. The BP-lowering effect of CKD-828 2.5/40 mg was significantly superior to S-amlodipine 2.5 mg (sitDBP/SBP: P=0.0028/P=0.0001).
5. The BP-lowering effect of CKD-828 2.5/80 mg was significantly superior to S-amlodipine 2.5 mg (P<0.0001/P=0.0012).

messages.content:
Statement: At Week 4, all groups showed significant antihypertensive effects but both CKD-828 combinations (CKD-828 2.5/40 mg and CKD-828 2.5/80 mg) exhibited superior BP-lowering effects to that of S-amlodipine 2.5 mg (sitDBP/SBP: P=0.0028/P=0.0001 and P<0.0001/P=0.0012, respectively).

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
